entries.meaning: One who salutes or praises with great approval.
examples: […]  the voices of thousands of spectators pealing in thunder from the rocks on which their dark and crowded masses rested  […]  sent forth a shout of mingled triumph on their appearance and approbation of their cause; and its echoes continued to roll round the hills long after the lips of the acclaimers were closed  […]
All our Dispute, is, what Companie, of so manie Acclaimers, is the true Church of CHRIST.
